Magic.description: Magic the Gathering is one of the first trading card games to be released. The game was released in 1993 by the same company that created Dungeons and Dragons, Wizards of the Coast.

Flesh and Blood.description: Flesh and Blood is one of the newest of these 5 card games, being released in 2019. This game, much like Magic the Gathering, is a stand-alone card game that wasn't adapted from another IP. With a rise in interest in trading card games, Legendary Story Studios capitalized by releasing Flesh and Blood which has quickly become popular in the TCG scene.

Pokemon.description: Pokemon was released in 1996. This game, much like Yu-Gi-Oh! was adapted from a TV show. However, unlike Yu-Gi-Oh!, the Pokemon TV show does not feature a game like the trading card game. Instead, the card game just references characters and items that appear in the show.

Yugioh.description: Yu-Gi-Oh! was released in 1999. This trading card game, unlike Magic, was adapted from a TV show of the same title, where the show focuses on characters who play a version of the game.

Digimon.description: Digimon is yet another game that was created based on an existing TV show. Originally released in 2000 as "Digi-Battle", the game was around for 1 year before the contract between Upper Deck and Bandai expired. In 2020, however, the card game has been rereleased as Digimon Card Game.

Super Mario 64.description: Super Mario 64 is one of, if not the most popular mario game that ever came out of nintendo studios. With the largest speedrunning scene out of any game ever created, this 27 year old game is still prospering today!

Super Mario Bros.description: Super Mario Bros , released in 1985, was the first mario game that picked up some pace from nintendo. Released on the popular NES (Nintendo Entertainment System) Super Mario Bros holds a special place in many peoples hearts.

New Super Mario Bros Wii.description: New Super Mario Bros Wii was one of the first mario games I got to play as a kid. The way the wii console revolusionized the gaming industry is, and always will be, unmatched to any other console.

Mario Kart Wii.description: Mario Kart Wii is regarded as one of the best mario kart games to be made. With a unique checkpoint system, players were able to take this game to the extremes; making a whole new catagory of ultra short-cuts.

Mario Kart 8 Deluxe.description: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is the most current mario kart game. In my opinion it doesnt quite live up to Mario Kart Wii, this is still a great game that is accessible to many. The Nintendo Switch console brings multiplayer functionality to it's peak, making this a great option for having fun with friends.

Super Mario Galaxy.description: Super Mario Galaxy was very unique and one of the real successful 3d mario games. The game utilized the new motion controls of Wii and was very popular, promoting a second release later on the Wii U.
